thread.section_title: Shangri-La's China World Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful experience
thread.title_full: Wonderful experience - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Jill B
title: Wonderful experience
text: From the moment we checked in to the Shangri la hotel in Beijing in the China World centre we were treated as very valuable guests. Warmly welcomed by all the staff and our every need was met. Having the Horizon Club benefits just made our stay amazing and the staff were so friendly anticipating our need for a cup of tea when we arrived each time which was often during the day.
